title: Can;t't lock in champ select
body: Why is it every couple of games even if i spam the "lock in" button, i cant  lock in, and it kicks me from the game? is it that hard to let me enjoy the only decent lobby in the game without the client screwing me around??

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sounds like you might be experiencing a connection issue.

Could you try running through the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) support article for me, let me know if that helps.
